title: Oru Naalum Unai Maravatha Lyrics Ejamaan
stanzas:
kangana ganavena
kingini kingini manigalum
olikka olikka engengilum
mangalam mangalam enum
mozhi mulanga mulanga
oru suyamvara nadakkinradhe
idhu sugam tharum
suyamvaramae

Oru Naalum unai maravaatha
inithaana varam vendum
uravaalum udal uyiraalum
piriyaatha varam vendum(2)

Vizhiyodu imai pole
vilagaatha nilai vendum
enai aalum ejamaane
enai aalum ejamaane
enai aalum ejamaane
enai aalum ejamaane

Oru Naalum unai maravaatha
inithaana varam vendum
uravaalum udal uyiraalum
piriyaatha varam vendum

Suttu viral nee kaattu
sonnapadi aaduven
unnaadimai naan endru
kaiezhuthu poduven

unndhiram pole naan
ponudalil oduven
un udalil naan oadi
ullazhagai theduven

thogai kondu nindraadum
thaen karumbu dhegam.
mundhi varum thaenmangi
pandhi vaikkum neram..

Vizhiyodu imai pole
vilagaatha nilai vendum
inaiyaana ilamaane
thuniyaana ilamaane
inaiyaana ilamaane
thuniyaana ilamaane

Kattil idum soottodu
thottil kattu anname
mullai kodi tharum andha
pillai kani vendume

unnai oru seipole
en madiyil thaangavaa
ennudaiya thaalaattu
kanmayangi thoongavaa

aariraarao nee paada
aasai undu maane
aaru yezhu ketaalum
petreduppen naane

muththiram varum
muththu dinam endru
sithiriam varum
visithiram endru

Oru Naalum unai maravaatha
inithaana varam vendum
uravaalum udal uyiraalum
piriyaatha varam vendum

Vizhiyodu imai pole
vilagaatha nilai vendum
inaiyaana ilamaane
thuniyaana ilamaane
enai aalum ejamaane
enai aalum ejamaane
